games.name: Spacewar!
games.summary: Early space combat game developed at MIT; widely cited as one of the first influential computer games.

games.name: Computer Space
games.summary: One of the first commercially sold coin-op video games.

games.name: Pong
games.summary: Foundational arcade table tennis game that popularized coin-op video games.
